question:
With respect to Environment, certain species of which of the following can work as indicator species?
  1. Lichens
  2. Molluscs
  3. Mosses
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Many biological species can define a trait or characteristic of the environment thus labelled as “Indicator species”. Certain Lichens are indicators of air pollution; while few Molluscs are indicators water pollution status. Similarly, certain mosses are indicators of soil pollution. Thus all choices are correct in this question.
